woah amazing weekend <3 friday night was megs surprise party so after school mandi came over and we hung out for awhile and got ready and stuff then we went to megs um a lot of people that said they were goin didnt show up which was not cool at all but it was still so much funn lol umm troy and chris came cuz michelle invited them like super last minute but thats cool cuz i love him <3 lol meg was so surprised she like peed =] haha yeah got home like 1130 passed out on the couch downstairs woke up at like 3 and went in my bed then i slept till like 1 in the afternoon lol then like went to the mall with britt mandi annie alyssa troy chris jimmy and peopleee it was funn we rode the carosol <3 =] i almost passed out from not eating but its all good .. after that me n annie slept over britt we stayed up forever till like 4 n me n annie hadda get up for ccd at like 8 blah so then i went to that then church wowww we have a new preist right ? i swear i've never heard anyone ANYONE talk that slow in my life .. and he kept snorting in the microphone thing me n jasmine were like dying lmao .. lol yeah then after britt came over for a lil and we hung and stuff

ok homebasee .. wow funnyest thing everr .. so we're all over by the tadpole lmao it was me heather sam shea mike joe and boness ..and we were like shaking the tank and making a tital waveee and then we were like wait what do they eat and joe was all 'there poop !' but yeah so shea thought this random cup of dirt in there  was there food so she dumped it on the tadpole lmao and mrs cleavland like flipped shes like no one is to touch the cage anymoreee haha soo funnyy ok so yeah ss then like scienceee uhh k then spanishhh boring blahh yeah then hahah gymm we played scooter football and uh our team was like me missy mack jasmine jr n tj and jr said if we won he would run around naked ? lol uhmm then language picture thingg ? idk i slept lol then lunchh well um tj told me and erica about his awesome spray tanning experience ? lol thats always cool  uhh then idk uhm algebraaa fun lol and yeah then i came home and i hadda goot loris for a littlee then i came home and its so freaken colddd like woahhh

ew 4 day weekend goes by fast =[

thursday night meg and michelle came over - we just like hung out played with my bunny lol talked and like watched candyman.. it was really weird .. meg fell asleep at like 4 and me and michelle went to sleep at 5 .. megan hadda leave at 1030 for a hair appointment so i woke up then but then fell asleep afer she left .. woke up at 1130 cuz the phone rang and it was troy so i talked to him for like a half hour then woke michelle up so we could go get bagels.. uhh we walked to the bagel store and saw kelly and maya talked to them for awhile then went to wawa then home then michelle hadda leave .. i was gunna goto the mall but i didnt feel good so i just did nothing all day lol .. tooday im goin to church with annie then goin to see the grudge ..  tommorow i have ccd then back to freakin school on monday =[

gg to annies comment me <3

i ♥ troy

hola havnt updated fully in awhile .. halloween i went with annie lauren kate and noelle good timess then monday night slept over britts cuz we had off on tuesday woww SO much funn britt lol talking to fish when he was high .. i'll have a rasberry burger and some hash brownies .. do you want fries with that ? yeah i wanna get fried .. lol then tuesday morning my mom picked me i went to the orthodontist .. and im getting my braces off next month ! =D .. lol so then i went back to britts and we made plans to goto the mall with people lol made the most digusting mac n cheese haha with cardboard in it and uh talked to troy and mandi on the phone for a littlee .. so then uhm troy and them couldnt go so just me britt and mandi were goin to the mall .. uhh britt was .. a little "hyper" haha it was funny .. she doesnt know what she did while she was haha it was pretty funny =] so me britt and mandi went to the mall it was cool lmao in the food court britt made some friends .. then uh me and mandi got stuff from aero.. then we sat on a bench and called troy and he was with people and meg and michelle talked to them and stuff then my mom picked us upp and dropped britt off and.. uhh brb somones at the dooorr lol .. oka backk that was annie lol randomm ok so anywayyy fdskjhkjshkjhvgsf dont wanna update anymoree gotta go babysit lol then meg and michelle are sleeping overr <33

hola im at britts and its hot as fricken hell in here.. ok soo tooday i cleaned then went over ericas and troy came over and we hung out and stuff  it was cool then i went over britts and we tee-peed peoples houses in her development lol and we did her house too cuz you know were awesome.. lol then we walked ot the video storee and rented thirteen and then watched it .. omg great movie .. yeahh so then tony and peter started bugging us to make a cake for them so we decided to poison them and put like a pound of salt in it and egg shells and stuff haha . lol umm but there animals and they said it was good and ate the whole cakee haha .. then we found a camera and took random pics lol and uhh talked to people and stuff gkhglkjdflkjg tommorow morning i hafta wake up at fricken 8:30 for gay ccd then church then annie me and people are goin over kates and then goin out for halloween . k britts gunna update now lol later <3 meg

comment bitch ! =D

tooday was pysco.. um well i didnt feel good last night so i wasnt gunna come to school tooday but then this morning i was fine so i decided i was gunna go so i could play in my game.. so my mom drove me and there was like people blocking the entrance to the school and this guy was like who are you and my moms like im dropping her off she goes here and hes like yeah well you cant be here there was a bomb threat.. so i hadda go over to ramtown and like sign in and find my team and we sat in a hallway for like an hour and a half then we went back at like 11 and only had 4 periods left of school it was weird.. then feild hockey we played eisenhower.. we got killed and i got beat up.. this girl smashed my thumb with her stick.. the ball hit my leg on the back where i had no shingaurd and i got hit in the head and the ball hit me in the finger and its all like not normal colored lol.. yeah well then me lori and britt went to the haunted house thign at the high school and this kid who was pretending to be british was our tour guide and we wnet through it like once and then we met up wiht maya kelly chris troy and people and went through it like 3495789 timess but thats cool . tommorow = game against north.. it our last game and we really need to win lol we havent won a single game.. oh and me and ali are the 2 all stars for the team so we get to go play in a special all star game..

i gotta goo read freaken across 5 aprilss
♥ comment <3 meg

ok so we lost our first game tooday but it was a really good game.. we lost 8-7 in internaitonal tie breaker.. haha before the game me and michelle were warming up pitching and she was talking about how she was dancing to italian music in giant pajamas last night lmao ilu.. then she told me about when she went to a zoo and a donkey snorted on her and she was saying how she wished she was a donkey because they can eat grass when there hungry and they have 2 humps.. and im just like.. michelle.. thats a camel.. so then we argued over whether donkeys have humps and they dont =] lol good times bffae.. after the game i went home with annie cuz my parentals went to my sisters games.. we walked to the video store and annie's foot went in the swamp and it was gross but funny lol. we rented swimfan and uhh watched it love that movie then we hung aorund and watched mrs doubtfire then i came homee.

gotta go eat <3 meg


good job heat love you <3

okay so today i had a tournament in stafford.. we did bad but thats ok lol.. the first game anna pitched and we lost but it wasnt that badd.. then we played the mystics ugg meanest team ever.. first of all we were all ready to jump the umpire.. then we were goin after center feilder.. lol yeah then we hadda break and me michelle annie and tyler hung out in my trunk then we went to the playground lol our lover .. then michelle started talking to some people from staten island cuz she knew them lol. i pitched the last game we did soo good we actually hit lol .. we mercied them like 16-1 .. then me and annie went to surf shoppppp <3 i got a pair of jeans and a shirt.. lala then um i went to brittsss and we got pizza then me her john and peter walked to the video store.. hahaha ok so me and britt were outside waiting for john and peter and i saw this amazingly hot kid sitting in a car directly in front of us but britt didnt see him cuz she was faced the other way reading a poster for the movie home on the range with the cowss.. so cool brittany starts singing HOMEEE HOMEE ON THE RANGEEE.. and of coursee the hot kid had his windows down.. so im like oh god brittany lets go inside.. RIGHT NOW.. ahah it was great.. then we saw jr tommy and derek cuz they have NO lives and were at qc at 8:00.. then we watched dawn of the dead omg it was great.. tommorow = game at 9 oclock so i get to miss ccd ! =] 

alright comment <3
♥ later -- meg

tommorow = home vs. wall ... haha we're gunna lose so bad but thats ok.. then after mall with britt and then we have a tournament on the weekend in stafforddddddd ! going to ron jonsss after woo <3

ok well today i had el softball it was cool then like everyone started making plans to goto fright fest but me and britt already had plans to hang with lori and plus i dont like great adventure so yeah. then brittany decided she was going to goto fright fest with them and idk we got into a huge fight and i was really upset and then her mom said she was like upset to and stuff and then i felt bad and now idk i guess we're all good. but anyway i hafta goto a confirmation mass at 5 . ew. then loris coming over so were just gunna hang. tommorow i have ccd. more ew. then 2 games in .. clark ? yeah its like 2 hours away so yeah..

okay wow tooday was sooooo much fun it was amazing . and yesterday tooooo <3 okay on friday after school + feild hockey annie and me went to the oneil surf pro . we got there at like 6 so we only got to see the last 2 heats . it was cool though the water was really nice . then at 8 they had the bonfire thing it was awesome . hot kids next to us <3 haha it was great the one kid was like im hot and took his shirt off me and annie were both like yes, you are <3 haha =] okay then annie slept over lmao crazyness . she broke my dice =[ so i got mad and attacked her then we just started hysterical laughing out of nowhere till we were crying. wow that was so crouching tiger hidden dragon lmfao lmfao wtf wow i feel like a flying squirrel haha wowww lmfao . hahaa annie this is what i do everynight before i goto bed .. all mightyyy elephantttttt .. lmfao lmfao we were crazy then we played uno and made up our own rules . yeah we wrote on the extra blank cards that come in the box: wild draw 20 and like haha you suck and sucks for you all over the cards then annie put down 3 of them in a row so yeah i had like the whole deck . lol ok this morning we went to practice then to the beach we went surfing for a little then walked over to belmar and met up with mandi meg heidi and brianna and then we walked back to 18th ave to the oneil thing where barry and the penatrators was playing . yeah me and annie saw him at surf fest . oh yess and the wonderful alex maz was there haha its so weird that we like know each other but we never met . until now ! lol anyway they were throwing free stuff and i caught a trucker hat and the barry signed it . people were making like mini mosh cirlces mandi got punched i got thrown lol crazy . okay then we went into eastern lines and the lady who worked there was following us around everywhere. and everything we touched she had to like fix . yeah it was so normal ? yeah then we went back out and the youth ahead was playing woah can you say amazing ? they were so good i wanted the cd but me and annie had to leave before they threw any out =[ yeah so we walked back to avon, got cheese fries, went on the swings.. lol we dont act like 4 years olds or anything noooo <3 lol then we went back to the house in avon and showered and went and got dinner and then went to the beach to see the endless summer because they played it on this humungo giant blow up projection screen and they played the movie on it and we just sat int he sand and atched it was soo cool. awesome <3 tommorow im going to the beach then tot he surf thing again with mandi =]

the youth ahead is god . <3

♥ meg -- comment me

okay update yeah . sunday uh ? dont remember monday was goood yes very =] tuesday after school hung out with lynchers fun . then tooday i had practice but it started raining so we went back to annies for a 'team meeting' .. well the parents did we just hung around . but we're getting our jackets ! ahh finnaly <3

okay yeah im going in the shower

um quick update cuz im tired . idk i havent been in a good mood lately .. i really dont like school . idk its just boring i guess . yeah seeing friends is cool . but idk . meg and erica are in all my classes which rules . but other wise its just school and it sucks . yeah anyway i went to the beach today .. yellow flag cuz of the hurricane .. when the tide went back out it was actually really good and i was going to go surfing but i didnt feel like walking back to the house to get my board . tomorow is the labor day beach party and meg's coming with me . <3 should be fun .. wow im so confused i dont even know.. i cant explain it .. yeah =\ yeah well comment if you want .. ♥ meg been here so long . think that its time to move winters so cold . s u m m e r s o v e r t o o s o o n

uggg i should be sleeping right now this is not cool at all . i dont wanna goto school yesterday was soo perfect . i went to the beach with lori and the gang its absolutely gorgeous . soo perfect the waves were awesome, i surfed better then i ever have, and i just didnt want it to end . we ordered pizza and ate on the beach . we stayed till 8 <3 it was the most perfect day of the whole summer =[ after we went to hoffmans for ice cream and then i came home and got ready for tooday .. now i hafta goto SHCOOL . THIS SUCKS .. okay yeah comment me ♥ meg hey thanks, thanks for that summer <3

okay so i went to lbi today and finnally did back to school shopping . and i spent 200 dollar and got a bazillion things from like ron jon and b&b and some place called sunsations . yea . we went to the beach too it was nice but i got stung by a jelly fish that had tentacles .. then it started thundering so we walked back to the house . uh i hung with my cousins and made string bracelet things lol then we watched stuck on you wow that was funny . yeahh i <3 lbi i wish i coulda stayed over like normal but nooooo we just have to go back to school so early . tommorow its supposed to rain but im going surfing anyway . yepp

okay well comment 
♥ meg =]

uh im in avon and leaving soon so quick update yeah .
yesterday i went to annies then we went to nicoles and um it was me annie meghan mandi lauren nicole and her friends heidi and chrissy.. soo anyway we walked to wawa to get slushies and on the waay we found the awesome big ball .. it was hugee and bouncy and it was just randomly sitting there so we took it and bounced it with us to wawa then on the way homee some lady saw us and said that my ball =[ .. not cool . anyway then me annie and nicole went swimming then ate then me and annie went to go babysit and nicole was babysittign next door lol . sdiofh the girl was soo cute she was 1 . well we babysat for 5 hours and made SIXTY BUCKSSSS .. hell yeaaahhhh !  we split so now i have moneey lol =] yea then tooday i went to the beach and got even more burnt . tommorow is our softball barbeque then monday im going to lbi then tuesday and wendsay im beachin it for as long as i can cuz thursday is the dreaded daaayy =[ well idk i kinda want to but lol im like not readdy to go back i havnt done like any shopping and yea i dont want homeworkk and crapp =[ its so random we go back for 2 days then we get 3 days off lol . oh yeah and next sunday is the big labor day beach day party thing . 
funn <33

okay so ga with annie was awesome . <3 bffaeaeae x 921783982 .. we only went on medusa [3 times] cuz everything else was ridiculously long .. superman = 3 friggin hour wait .. whatever i really dont like 6 flags lol thats why i only go like every 4 years .. but it was still tons of funn . so anyway i hear that we get teams tommorow . im pissed as hell its so not cool . im not going back i hate school so much . arrhehjrgfjdhg i hope this year is actually good . im so sick of all the ridiculous drama that goes on, and all the lame teachers and fucking homework .. i cant take it . im not going back summer is so perfect . ugh well enough with the bitching the bottom line is i hate school . k im beachin it all day tommorow so yea . comment &heart; meg

ok havent updated in a long timee .. this week i slept over annies on saturday then sunday we went to see the notebook at the bradely beach cinema... wow saddest movie ever it was soo incredibly good . my new favorite movie . we cried so much . anyway then i went home and my cousin came monday it was rainy so we went to the mall .. my dad gave me mula for back to school clothes and stuff i spent it all and got lots-a stuffffff .. yaa blah then tuesday uhh beach i think  idk one of the days that my cousin was here we went to jackson outlet and the power went out ! haha but then it went back on yea bought more clothesss . but i didnt get my new vans ! =[ anyway thursday beach till llike 7 haha and just like my icon i surfed till like it was almost dark .. cool so yea friday beach again lori was there =].. then last night my gram took me beth and kristin to the boardwalkk woah funn x 3475975834957 .. yea then toooday kristin left and then i went to annies with lauren meghan gab to practice for feild hockey but uhh ti tuhnderstormed so we hung in her basement lmao we were pysco .. the mind controlling chalk and our awesome side pony tails <3 haha then being like old ghetto men and sumo wrestling, being bulls .. lmfao so hilarious.. then lauren gab and meghan left and me and annie played frogger and a spice girl game lmao okay so then we decided we wanted to listen to the spice girls haha so we listened to them and bewitched haha then some Now CD's <3 yaa soo cool then dinnerr and then we played cardss woo and woah tommorow = great adventure with annie waa gunna be so crazy and clarence clemens is playing and for all you cool people like meghan who thought clarence clemens was from the backstreet boys lmao.. hes not . hes from bruce springsteen and the e-street band <3 haha k so that will be awesome 

k comment
later ♥ meg
